item.title: Generative art in R
item.dc:creator: Danielle Navarro
item.description: Comments on an exhibit I contributed to as part of useR!2021

item.title: Bootstrap cards in distill
item.dc:creator: Danielle Navarro
item.description: How to enable bootstrap 4 on a distill website, even though you probably don't need to. I like it though because I get to add pretty bootstrap cards

item.title: Pretty little CLIs
item.dc:creator: Danielle Navarro
item.description: How to make a gorgeous command line interface in R using the cli package. Somewhere along the way I accidentally learned about ANSI control codes, which strikes me as unfortunate

item.title: Welcome to the jungle
item.dc:creator: Danielle Navarro
item.description: I have reluctantly decided to create a new blog. Some thoughts on what I hope to achieve, having tried my hand at blogging so very many times before
